Package fr.cnrs.iees.rvgrid.rendezvous

Class RVMessage

java.lang.Object
fr.cnrs.iees.rvgrid.rendezvous.RVMessage
public class RVMessage extends Object

Data exchanged between two GridNodes at rendezvous.

Messages contain a type that is used by the GridNode to decide which RendezvousProcess must be activated to process them at a rendezvous, i.e. when GridNode.callRendezvous(...) is called. This class can be used as is or may have descendants for specific applications.

Author:
Ian Davies - 14 ao√ªt 2019
after Shayne Flint, 2012

  • Constructor Details

    • RVMessage

      public RVMessage​(int type, Object payload, GridNode source, GridNode target)
      Messages must be constructed knowing their type, caller and receiver. They can carry information (payload) of any kind.
      Parameters:
      type - the type of RendezvousProcess to call at rendezvous
      payload - any additional information to pass to the RendezvousProcess.execute(...) method
      source - the caller GridNode
      target - the receiver GridNode

  • Method Details

    • getMessageHeader

      public RVMessageHeader getMessageHeader()
      Getter for the RVMessageHeader which contains the caller, receiver and type information
      Returns:
      the RVMessageHeader for this message

    • payload

      public Object payload()
      Getter for the additional information contained in the message.
      Returns:
      the additional information to pass to the RendezvousProcess.execute(...) method
